hymn.title: Beloved Let Us Love One Another
hymn.copyright: (c) 1974 Universal Music â€” Brentwood Benson Publ. (ASCAP) (adm. at CapitolCMGPublishing.com) All rights reserved. Used by permission.

lyrics.stanza: Beloved, let us love one another, For love is of God, And everyone that loveth is born of God And knoweth God. He that loveth not knoweth not God, For God is love. Beloved, let us love one another.
